mapper.select: select g.* from game g join game_round gr on g.id=gr.game_id and gr.deleted=0 where g.deleted=0 and gr.id=#{roundId}
select count(g.id) from game g join game_user gu on gu.game_id=g.id and gu.deleted=0 where g.deleted=0 and g.status=30 and gu.user_id=#{userId}
select g.* from game g join game_user gu on gu.game_id=g.id and gu.deleted=0 where g.deleted=0 and g.status in (0,1) and gu.user_id=#{userId} order by g.id desc limit 1
